titles.title: A resolution relating to the death of the Honorable William "Bill" Emerson Brock III, former United States Senator for the State of Tennessee.
A resolution relating to the death of the Honorable William "Bill" Emerson Brock III, former United States Senator for the State of Tennessee.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution mourns the death of former Senator William "Bill" Emerson Brock III and requests that a copy of this resolution be transmitted to the family of the Senator.
